description:
For those having Gmail sign on issues...
Go to myaccount.google.com, on the left click on security, scroll down to "2-Step Verification" and click on the ">", type in your Google password, scroll to bottom and click on ">" in "App passwords" area. Create a new app specific password and use that generated one to log into your Gmail account within the BlueMail setup.
Hope this helps
summary: How to sign into Gmail in BlueMail setup..

description: Horrible app. Slow, full of ads, hard to navigate settings. Doesn't have any unique features. Use anything else.
summary: I forgot how bad proprietary software can get

description: Mix a modern interface (similar to Geary, my second favorite) with more powerful features. Not five stars because there is an issue preventing me to connect my Gmail account.
summary: Probably, the best email client for Linux right now

description:
В отличии от плагина в thunderbird Equilla приложения позволяет бесплатно пользоваться почтой с exchange

но обновление папок происходит только в ручную. Что не удобно. Если почта без разбивок по папкам, то все письма видна. При всех фишках и удобстве, отсутствие синхронизации всех папок существенный минус. Приходится каждый раз в ручную проверять каждую папку, не пришли ли письма. При этом Thunderbird делает это быстро и с уведомлениями.
I cannot login to Gmail neither with Firefox or Edge. It just stays in the login stage forever.
The authorization for gmail took endless time. 365 email works fine. I am on Fedora 37 workstation
Gmail doesnt work , keeps on loading and fails to sign in. Can the bug be fixed by the app developer.
Flatpak or Snap version of Bluemail will not login to email account from browser.  Could only get debian (.Deb) install to login correctly but Debian version is pretty old.
Currently doesn't log into Gmail :(
Gmail does not work. stuck on setup screen for ever.
summary: Gmail does not work. stuck on setup screen for ever

description: This doesn't connect to Gmail on Debian 12 bookworm and just stays stuck on setup. This needs fixing ASAP

Gmail accounts are not connecting through the normal Sign In. I had to use IMAP and didn't have an issue (just make sure to create an App Password inside the 2auth section of your google account).

Besides that I feel that it is a bit sluggish/slow when selecting multiple emails, but that is the least of my worries right now
Currently doesn't log into Gmail!
Crashed when trying to sign into google.

Dark mode works well. Emails are also dark, thank goodness!

Has some very useful features like the read-later (later board) and AI Reply, which seems to work surprisingly well but I can't find out how many times it can be used for free.

Gives me access to my Apple calendar from within Linux without any fuss.

Works on my iPhone providing a seamless experience with Linux.

Evolution does some of these things now but with a couple more hoops to jump through.
Would very much like to try it though.
summary: I can't sign in with gmail

description: whenever i try to log in to gmail the app goes in an infinite loading screen

Does anybody have a reliable fix for Gmail on Linux? These guys seriously want to charge money for this app, but can't be bothered to do whatever it takes to get the most POPULAR email service on the planet to work in their app. It's a shame that this is the only email app on linux that doesn't look like cancer.

complitly buggy app 
it have flicker issues and cant connect to google accounts without any error message
Läuft einfach, die bekannte ALternative laggt auf meinem Fedora Linux wie jeck und BlueMail ist schnell und stabil. Mir gefällt der kombinierte Posteingang.
Nach erfolgreichem Anmelden im E-Mail Account fängt Programm an zu laden und wird nicht fertig. Ich für meine Verhältnisse nehme wieder Evolution, das funktioniert ohne Probleme.
Gmail nunca me abre a pesar de aceptar las condiciones

he utilizado BlueMail por mas de un año y es un excelente cliente de correo, pero en mi sistema actual, openSuse microOS, al usar solo paquetería flatpak, no parece haber una implementación completa, ya que al vincular las cuentas de Google la aplicación queda a la espera de la autorización vía Web aún cuando esta ya ha sido otorgada.
problem to connect at Gmail
It works great on Win11, but here (Open SuSE Tumbleweed) it does not work at all. Just endless efforts to connect...
summary: Application does not work on Linux
